name: MUGEN FIGHTERS ULTIMATE
description:
Do you have what it takes to survive the and beat the boss?

Conquer all fighters trying to stop you to defeat the boss.

Your objective is to eliminate all fighters and mostly kill the last fighter which is your victory.

Welcome to MUGEN FIGHTERS ULTIMATE ver. 1.0

-20 characters and more to come.

Always stay tune for upcoming updates we will be adding more characters on this game.

The controls are just super easy:

A         -                  COMBO CLICK MULTIPLE TIMES

FORWARD B - 1ST SKILL

FORWARD C - 2ND SKILL

FORWARD X - 3RD SKILL

FORWARD Y - 4TH SKILL

FORWARD Z - 5TH SKILL

BACKWARD B- 6TH SKILL (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

BACKWARD C- 7TH SKILL (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

BACKWARD X- 8TH SKILL (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

BACKWARD Y- 9TH SKILL (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

BACKWARD Z- 10TH SKILL (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

A+B       - HYPER 1

B+C       - HYPER 2

X+Y       - HYPER 3

Y+Z       - HYPER 4

A+X       - HYPER 5 (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

B+Y       - HYPER 6 (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

C+Z       - HYPER 7 (DEPENDS ON FIGHTER)

X+B       - THROW

For android, you may need exagear app to play this game. 

Hope you'll enjoy the game :)

And please do support me for the progression on this game.

Much appreciated.
